DoggyBag.NAME: Doggy Bag
DoggyBag.FLAVOR: The carefully packed remains of a tasty meal.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you defeat an elite, raise your Max HP by 10.

EternalHunger.NAME: Eternal Hunger
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and draw 1 extra card.

Gemstone.NAME: Gemstone
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, if you have 300 or more gold, gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity.

InfiniteFamine.NAME: Infinite Famine
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Eternal Hunger. At the start of your turn, lose 2 HP and draw 2 extra card.

Lollipop.NAME: Lollipop
Lollipop.FLAVOR: A satisfying solution to an oral fixation.
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the HP loss of Eternal Hunger, Infinite Famine, and Hunger Pangs by 1.
